net.morimekta.providence.mio

Class IOMessageWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.morimekta.providence.mio.IOMessageWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, MessageWriter

    public class IOMessageWriter
extends Object
implements MessageWriter
    A writer helper class for matching a serializer with an output stream.
